Key Match Events: Spencer Horwitz hit a Statcast-projected 420-foot homer over the center-field wall in the top of the second
Horwitz sent a 421-foot blast into the right-field bleachers in the top of the fourth
Horwitz drove in Vladimir Guerrero Jr. from first with an RBI double in the fifth
Pre-Game Insights: Horwitz benefited from hitting behind Vladimir Guerrero Jr. in the order
Blue Jays manager John Schneider did not confirm if Horwitz would start against Chris Sale on Sunday
Post-Match Reflections: Horwitz credited assistant hitting coach Matt Hague for his success
Berríos earned his 15th win of the season
José Berríos stated he plans to aim for 20 wins in a season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Horwitz's second multi-homer game of his career
